data.title: Elizabeth Hurley, Arun Nayar granted divorce
data.meta_description: British actress and Indian businessman married in lavish ceremonies on two continents four years ago
data.text:
(CBS/AP) LONDON - Actress Elizabeth Hurley and businessman Arun Nayar are now officially divorced.

The divorce decree was granted at a brief hearing in London Wednesday by District Judge Penny Cushing.

Pictures: Celebrity splits

Pictures: Elizabeth Hurley

Neither Hurley nor Nayar was in court. The grounds given for the divorce was Nayar's "unreasonable behavior."

The British actress and Indian businessman married in 2007 at an English castle, with singer Elton John giving the bride away. They followed up the private civil ceremony with a lavish and traditional Hindi wedding in Jodphur, India.

Pictures: Their castle wedding

Pictures: Their India wedding

Hurley announced last December that the couple had separated, and filed for divorce in April. She has since been romantically linked to Australian cricket star Shane Warne.

Hurley, 46-years old, dated actor Hugh Grant for more than a decade and has a 9-year-old son, Damian, from a relationship with film producer Steve Bing.
